settings.content: Kosha® stands at the forefront of technical winter and travel wear in India, offering innovative solutions from kidswear to plus sizes. Our layering systems are meticulously designed for temperatures ranging from -20°C to 15°C, ensuring maximum comfort and adaptability. By integrating cutting-edge materials and advanced technologies, Kosha® provides lightweight, durable garments that offer unparalleled warmth and ease of movement. Each piece is crafted to withstand extreme conditions while maintaining a sleek, ergonomic design. Whether you're scaling peaks or exploring new cities, trust Kosha® to deliver superior performance and exceptional style. Catering to eco-conscious travelers, Kosha® champions immersive, empathetic travel experiences. Experience the perfect blend of technology and comfort with Kosha®, and make every journey a testament to your adventurous spirit.

settings.heading: A Legacy of Craftsmanship and Innovation
settings.text:
Kosha is a young lifestyle clothing brand with a rich heritage spanning over 70 years. Our story began in 1947, during the partition of India and Pakistan, when countless families were displaced, including the family of our founder. Her grandfather, Mr. Devidas Vazirani, came to India from Karachi and opened a clothing store in the heart of Bombay, aptly naming it Davysons. Specializing in trench coats, jackets, thermal wear, and various winter accessories, Davysons quickly became the go-to winter wear store.

In 1996, Mrs. Vandana Jhangiani, daughter of Mr. Alimchand and Mrs. Prem Vazirani, led the way with the renowned Prrem’s store. Her passion and warmth earned it the nickname ""The Friendly Store."" As a third-generation entrepreneur, our founder transformed her family business, Prrem’s, into Kosha in June 2017. Incorporating feedback from loyal customers and the community, she introduced non-itchy thermals, super warm yet lightweight jackets, and more, making Kosha's offerings more relevant and appealing to modern travelers.

settings.heading: What We Do: Innovation x Utility
settings.text:
Something for Everyone

At Kosha, we understand that the love for travel knows no bounds. If your size isn't available, we'll happily customize it for you to ensure your comfort on every adventure.

Crafted with Care and Technical Excellence

Our designs are meticulously crafted with special technical features that enhance both comfort and performance during your travels. Whether you're in the bustling streets of Mumbai or the chilly hills of Manali, our line of sweatshirts and bamboo fiber pullovers are perfect for light winter conditions. For those traveling overseas, our vibrant colors and sleek designs make Kosha the preferred choice. Our screen-friendly gloves will keep your fingers warm and functional. From stylish accessories like stoles, beanies, and mufflers to practical sweatshirts and hoodies, we have something for every occasion and destination.

Ergonomic Designs for the Modern Traveler

Our collection is not just stylish but also highly technical. We design our garments with an optimal weight-to-warmth ratio, ensuring maximum comfort and performance. One of our hero products is the Kosha Base Layer, made from Merino wool and bamboo fiber. These thermals are 100% eco-friendly, crafted from soft, new-age nanotech fibers that are a far cry from old-school itchy wool.

We offer jackets for skiing with built-in ski pass pockets and powder skirts to keep the snow out, ski pants with built-in gaiters, and advanced socks with cushioned pressure points and arch support—ideal for walking tours and treks. Our multi-functional clothing includes jackets with underarm vent zips and puffer jackets that pack into a pouch, saving you space in your check-in bag. For business travelers, our stylish trench coats are a perfect choice. From classic pullovers in cotton and wool to rain pants and jackets with seam sealing, our technical garments meet every travel need with waterproof and breathable fabrics.

settings.content_top:
A Team of Passionate Travelers
Kosha is brought to life by a vibrant team of young travelers who infuse their own stories of self-discovery into our brand. Our team members are adventurers at heart—some climb the highest peaks with ease, others delve into world cultures, and many are dedicated to exploring global music scenes. Together, we have built a company that merges our unique styles into a traveler’s dream.
settings.content_bottom:
A Community of Explorers
What sets Kosha apart is not just our exceptional winter wear and travel gear but our commitment to creating a community of explorers. Our individual travel stories and experiences shape our products, making them more than just clothing; they are companions on your adventures. From the bustling markets of Mumbai to the serene slopes of the Himalayas, Kosha gear is designed to enhance every journey.
